original_title: Lettre à mon frère Guy Gilles, cinéaste trop tôt disparu
overview: Posthumous tribute paid by actor Luc Bernard to his older brother, director Guy Gilles ( 1938 - 1996 ). Documentary composed of interviews with some of his brother's friends and some actors from his main films, excerpts of which we see.
title: Letter to my brother Guy Gilles, filmmaker who passed away too soon
